description: This file defines the `AppTheme` class which provides theming configurations for a Flutter application, following the "Ocean Professional" palette. It includes color definitions, theme data for light mode, and styling for UI components like AppBar, Card, InputDecoration, FloatingActionButton, and SnackBar.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods and constants for theming a Flutter app following the Ocean Professional palette.

methods.name: AppTheme._
methods.description: Private constructor to prevent instantiation of the class.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Creates and returns a ThemeData object configured for light mode with custom color scheme and component themes.
